languages.text: Культ Последнего восхода заразил колонию колдовской болезнью. Людей терзает демонический голод — чтобы утолить его, они готовы набить брюхо даже несъедобными вещами.
The Cult of the Final Dawn has infected the colony with a sorcerous disease. Wicked hunger torments the victims, compelling them to sate it by any means available, including inedible ones.
languages.original_text: Культ Последнего восхода заразил колонию колдовской болезнью. Людей терзает демонический голод — чтобы утолить его, они готовы набить брюхо даже несъедобными вещами.

traits.locale_text: The Cult of the Final Dawn has infected the colony with a sorcerous disease. Wicked hunger torments the victims, making them sate it by any means available, including inedible ones.
The colony was hit by scrap-code brought to the planet by envoys of the Cult of the Final Dawn.
The Cult of the Final Dawn has infected the colony with a sorcerous disease. Wicked hunger torments the victims, compelling them to sate it by any means available, including inedible ones.
The colony was hit by scrap-code brought to the planet by envoys of the Cult of the Final Dawn.

The Cult of the Final Dawn has infected the colony with a sorcerous disease. Wicked hunger torments the victims, compelling them to sate it by any means available, including inedible ones.
The Cult of the Final Dawn has infected the colony with a sorcerous disease. Wicked hunger torments the victims, compelling them to sate it by any means available, including inedible ones.

languages.text: Le Culte de l'Aube finale a infecté la colonie à l'aide d'une maladie occulte. Tourmentées par une faim insatiable, les victimes en sont réduites à se nourrir de tout et n'importe quoi, comestible ou pas.
languages.original_text: The Cult of the Final Dawn has infected the colony with a sorcerous disease. Wicked hunger torments the victims, compelling them to sate it by any means available, including inedible ones.

traits.locale_text: Le Culte de l'Aube finale a infecté la colonie à l'aide d'une maladie occulte. Tourmentées par une faim insatiable, les victimes en sont réduites à se nourrir de tout et n'importe quoi, comestible ou pas.

languages.text: 最後の夜明け魔女団がコロニーを魔術的な病に感染させた。邪悪な飢えが犠牲者を苦しめ、食用に適さないものも含めてあらゆる手段で飢えを満たせと強制する。
languages.original_text: The Cult of the Final Dawn has infected the colony with a sorcerous disease. Wicked hunger torments the victims, compelling them to sate it by any means available, including inedible ones.

traits.locale_text: 最後の夜明け魔女団がコロニーを魔術的な病に感染させた。邪悪な飢えが犠牲者を苦しめ、食用に適さないものも含めてあらゆる手段で飢えを満たせと強制する。

languages.text: 终末黎明教派通过某些巫术手段感染了这个殖民地。邪恶的力量折磨着受害者，让所有人饥肠辘辘，不惜食用一切东西填饱肚子，甚至包括那些根本不能吃的东西。
languages.original_text: The Cult of the Final Dawn has infected the colony with a sorcerous disease. Wicked hunger torments the victims, compelling them to sate it by any means available, including inedible ones.

traits.locale_text: 终末黎明教派通过某些巫术手段感染了这个殖民地。邪恶的力量折磨着受害者，让所有人饥肠辘辘，不惜食用一切东西填饱肚子，甚至包括那些根本不能吃的东西。

languages.text: El Culto del Amanecer Final ha infectado la colonia con una enfermedad bruja. Las víctimas sienten un hambre terrible que las impulsa a saciarla por cualquier medio, incluyendo mediante cosas no comestibles.
languages.original_text: The Cult of the Final Dawn has infected the colony with a sorcerous disease. Wicked hunger torments the victims, compelling them to sate it by any means available, including inedible ones.

traits.locale_text: El Culto del Amanecer Final ha infectado la colonia con una enfermedad bruja. Las víctimas sienten un hambre terrible que las impulsa a saciarla por cualquier medio, incluyendo mediante cosas no comestibles.

languages.text: Der Kult der letzten Dämmerung hat die Kolonie mit einer magischen Krankheit infiziert. Ein grausamer Hunger quält die Opfer und zwingt sie, alles zu essen, was sie finden, selbst Dinge, die nicht zum Essen bestimmt sind.
languages.original_text: The Cult of the Final Dawn has infected the colony with a sorcerous disease. Wicked hunger torments the victims, compelling them to sate it by any means available, including inedible ones.

traits.locale_text: Der Kult der letzten Dämmerung hat die Kolonie mit einer magischen Krankheit infiziert. Ein grausamer Hunger quält die Opfer und zwingt sie, alles zu essen, was sie finden, selbst Dinge, die nicht zum Essen bestimmt sind.

languages.text: Nihai Şafak Tarikatı, koloniyi sihirli bir hastalıkla enfekte etti. Kurbanlara musallat olan şeytani bir açlık, onları yenmeyecek şeylerle bile olsa bu açlığı gidermeye zorluyor.
languages.original_text: The Cult of the Final Dawn has infected the colony with a sorcerous disease. Wicked hunger torments the victims, compelling them to sate it by any means available, including inedible ones.
